snippet: Robert L. Nardelli is ending his formal ties to Cerberus Capital Management, the private equity firm that installed him as the chief executive of Chrysler nearly two years before the carmaker filed for bankruptcy.
abstract: Robert L. Nardelli is ending his formal ties to Cerberus Capital Management, the private equity firm that installed him as the chief executive of Chrysler nearly two years before the carmaker filed for bankruptcy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Nardelli Steps Down From Most of His Cerberus Roles
headline.print_headline: A Cerberus Executive Resigns From Most of His Company Roles
